issue.title: [Go] Remove deprecated aliases for v8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16192](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16192). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Several aliases were introduced in v7 to ease conversion from v6 -> v7 with some of the renaming that had been done such as `array.Interface` becoming `arrow.Array`. These were all marked as being removed in v8. So we should remove the deprecated aliases

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16192?focusedCommentId=17525757) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12878
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12878>
